metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1887 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The search term could have been specified externally to trigger SQL injection. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 101.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap alexmurray> Only affects Firefox for iOS

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
